title: Welcome to the Website of Sakhil Goel
text: Hello there! I am an undergraduate student at the University of Toronto studying Statistics, Economics and Computer Science. I invite you to explore my website to find out more.

title: About
text:
Hello, my name is Sakhil Goel. I am currently an undergraduate student at the University of Toronto, working towards a degree in Statistics, Economics, and Computer Science.
I am very passionate about software development, with a focus on data analysis. Throughout the years I have gained experience in creating software projects and research papers both independently and as part of a team.
I am proficient developing algorithms and data structures in many different programming languages such as Python, R, and SQL, where I apply analytical thinking to solve complex problems. Alongside my technical proficiency, I possess a deep understanding of different statistical methods and economic principles.
For a detailed look at my qualifications, you can find my CV at the top of this website.

title: Contact
text:
Feel free to contact me for any inquiries, collaborations, or even just to say hello at s.goel@mail.utoronto.ca
I look forward to hearing from you!
